name: Dread Walker Excavator
movement: climbing, walking, and swimming speed of 30 feet
description: The Dread Walker Excavator is a Large Construct known for its robust build, high agility, and offensive capabilities. It features two powerful forelegs and can effortlessly climb walls and ceilings.
memorable: The Excavator releases unstable arcane energy when damaged, harming nearby attackers, making it a dangerous foe in close combat.
goals: Engage enemies in combat, maintain defense, and utilize arcane abilities.
relations: Related to other Constructs and may serve as guardians or workers in arcane environments.
environment: Often found in locations tied to magic or construction, such as ruins or underground complexes.
strengths: Immunity to poison and psychic damage, resistances to nonmagical physical damage, and the ability to deal force damage to melee attackers.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical attacks that can bypass its resistances.
attacks: Strikes with two foreleg attacks delivering piercing damage; also capable of firing a powerful Excavation Beam dealing force damage from a distance.
most_powerful_ability: Arcane Instability, which deals damage to creatures that make melee attacks against it when its health is low.
senses: Possesses darkvision and tremorsense, allowing it to detect creatures within 60 feet even in darkness or through obstructions.
skills: Proficient in perception, with a +6 bonus, making it adept at noticing hidden or approaching threats.
additional_information: Immune to blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, and poisoned conditions.
Ability to traverse difficult surfaces effortlessly, increasing its tactical mobility in battles.
Combines melee and ranged attacks for versatile combat engagement.
test_queries: mobile monster that climbs walls easily
creature that harms attackers with instability
excavator that deals force damage from range
robotic enemy immune to poison and psychic
